content:
Add Article Recommendations to a Flow

The Article Recommendations action takes a Case ID as input and returns a JSON list of recommended articles identified from your active Einstein Article Recommendations model.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience, Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited editions. Available in partner edition orgs if enabled.

USER PERMISSIONS
NEEDED
To assign permission sets.
Agents need Read access to see and apply Einstein Article recommendations.

From Setup, enter Flows, select the flow where you want to add article recommendations.
Drag the Action element onto the canvas, select Create Article Recommendations, give the action a label and description.
Under Set Input Values, Record ID, select the Case ID field.
Click Done, save your changes.

The Article Recommendation action returns a JSON list of recommended articles.
See how to use the recommendations by assigning the JSON output from the Article Recommendations action to a collection variable.

EXAMPLE
[{
"knowledgeArticleId" : "kA0RM0000006XDh0AM",
"knowledgeArticleVersionId" : "ka0RM0000006E0uYAE",
...
}]

DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
title: Adding Article Recommendations to a Service Cloud Flow
